-  init(title:description:default:requestValueDialog:inputConnectionBehavior:) 

Initializer# init(title:description:default:requestValueDialog:inputConnectionBehavior:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
convenience init(
    title: LocalizedStringResource,
    description: LocalizedStringResource? = nil,
    default defaultValue: Value.UnwrappedType? = nil,
    requestValueDialog: IntentDialog? = nil,
    inputConnectionBehavior: InputConnectionBehavior = .default
)
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, `Value.ValueType` conforms to `Decodable`, and `Value.ValueType` conforms to `Encodable`.
title: init(title:description:default:requestValueDialog:inputConnectionBehavior:) | Apple Developer Documentation
